Description: Tropicana Hotel & Casino in Atlantic City, New Jersey, under an agreement reached with the Department of Justice, agreed to pay $75,000 in civil penalties to settle allegations of workplace discrimination.

Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
